biospec_descr.textblock:
•Patients receiving various types of surgeries under sedation, especially for procedures of
      colonoscopy, upper gastrointestinal endoscopy, endoscopic retrograde
      cholangiopancreatography (ERCP) cystoscopy and other brief surgeries you are interested in
      the study.

brief_summary.textblock: Testing the efficacy and safety of the WEI Nasal Jet.

clinical_study.brief_title: Testing the Efficacy and Safety of the WEI Nasal Jet

detailed_description.textblock:
This is only initial thought and suggestions from the inventor Dr. Huafeng Wei. Principal
      investigator from each medical center interested in testing this new device should design
      their own clinical trials based on patient population and their own ideas for clinical
      trials. Just remind you that patient safety is number one and try all efforts to minimize
      patient risks during your clinical study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients receiving various types of surgeries under sedation, especially for
             procedures of colonoscopy, upper gastrointestinal endoscopy, endoscopic retrograde
             cholangiopancreatography (ERCP) cystoscopy and other brief surgeries you are
             interested in the study.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with coagulopathy and tendency of nose bleeding.

          -  Patients with any diagnosed cardiac diseases (e.g. cardiac failure, angina, MI,
             cardiac arrhythmia. etc.)

          -  Patients with any diagnosed pulmonary disease (e.g. asthma, COPD, pulmonary embolism,
             pulmonary edema etc.)

          -  Pregnant patients

          -  Patients with liver failure

          -  Patients with kidney failure

study_pop.textblock:
Suggested patient inclusion criteria:

        Patients receiving various types of surgeries under sedation, especially for procedures of
        colonoscopy, upper gastrointestinal endoscopy, endoscopic retrograde
        cholangiopancreatography (ERCP) cystoscopy and other brief surgeries you are interested in
        the study.

clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of the WEI Nasal Jet

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Compare with Control group,there was no significant difference in lowest SaO2 in Wei JET group.
primary_outcome.measure: lowest SaO2 in Wei JET group

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Prospective
